title: 求一个1.8.3纯净客户端
txt_content: 求一个1.8.3的纯净客户端，用来玩地图..

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content:
下载地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1pJmLqtX
新建一个文件夹，吧压缩包的“.minecraft”文件夹拖到那个新文件夹，然后下载http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dDBxTLn#path=%252FHelloMinecraft!Launcher(%25E8%25AF%25B7%25E6%2589%2593%25E5%25BC%2580%25E6%2596%2587%25E4%25BB%25B6%25E5%25A4%25B9)%252FWindows%25EF%25BC%2588%25E7%259C%258B%25E4%25B8%258D%25E6%2587%2582%25E5%25B0%25B1%25E5%2588%25B0%25E8%25BF%2599%25E9%2587%258C%25E9%259D%25A2%25E6%259D%25A5这个启动器，把这个启动器移动到你刚才新建的文件夹
